issue.title: [Rust] [Parquet] Add README
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4062](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4062). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
We should augment the existing README with information about the newly added Parquet support.
